  • Enclosing class:
    Gui

    private class Gui.Theme
extends java.lang.Object
    A container for all the design elements of the Gui (NOTE: This was my attempt to implement the Strategy Design pattern. Unfortunately, due to time constraints this class is now somewhat vestigial....)
    Author:
    Jennifer Winer
